Welcome To WiCS-UCSB!
Join WiCS

Our Mission

Bridge Gaps

Foster collaboration and understanding to bridge gender and diversity gaps in the tech industry through our Women in Computer Science club.

Celebrate Diversity

Celebrate diversity and inclusion in the field of technology at UC Santa Barbara.

Build a Community

Create a diverse and inclusive community that fosters collaboration, growth, and mutual support among all members.

Our Community

When you join WiCS, you join a community.

  • WiCS' Fall Welcome Dinner

    Our annual welcome dinner to learn about WiCS, meet other students, WiCS officers, and CS faculty.

  • First Social of the Year!

    In our first social, we cultivate a tight-knit community and members grow closer through fun games and snacks.

  • Q&A for ERSP

    A panel of previous ERSP alumni shared their experiences with getting involved in undergrad resarch on campus through the program.

  • Grace Hopper Conference

    In partnership with the CS Department, WiCS provided scholarships for students to attend the Grace Hopper Conference!

  • Join our
    community
    today!

Fall Welcome Dinner

Hello everyone! We will be hosting a welcome dinner to celebrate the new year, give you all a chance to meet each other and the CS faculty, and learn more about WiCS. This will be an awesome event to meet new people and enjoy good food. We sincerely invite all majors and genders to join us! Please RSVP to give us a headcount.

Information
Date: October 6
Time: 5:00pm-7:00pm (you are free to come at any time)
Location: SRB Multi-Purpose Room
No dress code :)

We hope to see you all there!

Build an AI Chatbot Workshop

Bring your laptops and come join us to learn how to build an AI chatbot, taught by Michael Saxon and Liubov Kurafeeva. We look forward to see you all there! All majors and genders are welcome :)

Conversations about Diversity in Computer Science

Come join the conversation with panelists, Rita Mounir from Allthenticate, Ishana Narayanan an incoming SWE at Google, Lenka Keston from Appfolio, and Alexis Cole from Amazon on the current state of diversity in Computer Science Education and Industry, how it affects minorities, and how we can make it better. We will also be having an open floor session where everyone can pitch in their thoughts and ideas. All majors and genders are welcome:)

  • When: Thursday, May 26th @ 5:30-6:30 PM
  • Where: HFH 1132

ERSP Q&A

Come join us to learn more about the Early Research Scholars Program, a first-time computer science research experience for undergraduates. Previous and current participants in the program will be present to talk about their experience and answer your questions. Snacks will also be provided! All majors and genders are welcome:)

  • When: Thursday, April 14th @ 5:00pm-6:00pm
  • Where: HFH 1132

Bigs and Littles

WiCS Spring Social

Come join WiCS at our second social event of the quarter. We'll be socializing, playing games, and eating food! We look forward to seeing all of you.
